purpose: To create a dynamic system of AI agents that can evolve and improve autonomously
principle: Utilizes evolutionary algorithms and multi-agent systems to enable agents to adapt and optimize their performance over time
reusability: Modular architecture allows for integration with existing AI systems and supports extensibility for new agent types
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited real-world testing, potential scalability issues with large agent populations
